CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymers P1 and P4-P6 show numberaverage molecular weight ( M n ) of 12^250 , 9934 , 5714 , and 10^053 , with polydispersity indices ( M w / M n ) of 1.30 , 1.43 , 1.71 , and 1.56 , respectively ( Table 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P6 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| P1 |
| P4 |
| P5 |
| P6 |

These are the entities in the paragraph that can be identified as material names based on the context. The other entities in the paragraph, such as "number-average molecular weight" and "polydispersity indices," do not refer to material names but rather properties of the materials.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The polymers P1 and P4-P6 show numberaverage molecular weight ( M n ) of 12^250 , 9934 , 5714 , and 10^053 , with polydispersity indices ( M w / M n ) of 1.30 , 1.43 , 1.71 , and 1.56 , respectively ( Table 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| number-average molecular weight of P1: 12^250 |
| number-average molecular weight of P4: 9934 |
| number-average molecular weight of P5: 5714 |
| number-average molecular weight of P6: 10^053 |
| polydispersity index of P1: 1.30 |
| polydispersity index of P4: 1.43 |
| polydispersity index of P5: 1.71 |
| polydispersity index of P6: 1.56 |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| number-average molecular weight of P1: 1.2 × 10^250 g/mol |
| number-average molecular weight of P4: 9934 g/mol |
| number-average molecular weight of P5: 5714 g/mol |
| number-average molecular weight of P6: 1 × 10^053 g/mol |
| polydispersity index of P1: 1.30 |
| polydispersity index of P4: 1.43 |
| polydispersity index of P5: 1.71 |
| polydispersity index of P6: 1.56 |

Note: I assumed that "M n" refers to molecular weight in grams per mole (g/mol) and "M w / M n" refers to polydispersity indices.
